description: This course explores the special considerations of pediatric, obstetric, and geriatric patients undergoing anesthesia. The pre-anesthesia assessment of these patients is discussed with particular emphasis on the commonly occurring complications and how to anticipate and manage them. Monitoring for anesthetic effect, hemodynamic effect and potential adverse reactions is reviewed using a case study approach
name: PRINCIPLES OF NURSE ANESTHESIA PRACTICE III

section.name: PRINCIPLES OF NURSE ANESTHESIA PRACTICE III
